'''Slightly Squashed Package''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained through exploration in [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]]. This item is used in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Lost Packages Retrieval]]''. Showing this item to [[NPC]] [[Michica]] changes it into [[Imix's Package]].
